Html:
When I changed the emulator to the "cut out" view from the options dialog, I lost all the menu's, and now I can't view the detached LCD screen, for example. How do I change back to the un-cut out view?

Thanks!1

Hello,

When you put the calc into cutout mode, the menu is accessible by right clicking on the LCD. From here you can access the options to put the calc back into the normal windowed mode.

Let me know if you have any other questions or suggestions.

BuckeyeDude

Thanks. I guess I tried everything but that!

From: BuckeyeDude [mailto:[email removed]]
Sent: Thursday, March 07, 2013 8:58 PM
To: [email removed]
Subject: Re: lost options when I changed emulator to "cut out" view [wabbit:435772]

From: BuckeyeDude

Hello,

When you put the calc into cutout mode, the menu is accessible by right clicking on the LCD. From here you can access the options to put the calc back into the normal windowed mode.

Let me know if you have any other questions or suggestions.

BuckeyeDude
